revised_title: Predicting and Analyzing Artificial Earth Satellites
tldr: The authors discuss the observations and analysis of Russian artificial earth satellites and the prediction services provided by the H.M. Nautical Almanac Office. They describe the methods used to predict the positions of satellites and the challenges faced due to the limitations of staff and equipment. The authors also mention the importance of accurate observations for studying the effects of the Earth's oblateness and atmosphere on satellite orbits.
